name: OpenXCOM: XCOM 2
overview: The war continues… X-COM: UFO Defense brought you to a galactic battlefield. X-COM: Terror from the Deep brings the alien terror into a totally new dimension. X-COM: Terror from the Deep is the follow-up to the resource management and tactical combat game X-COM: Enemy Unknown. This OpenXCom recompilation was planned for Vampire but due to very inefficient loading code it took long minutes for this game to load. This is not a problem for Pistorm with Emu68 so I’ve decided to release it only for this accelerator.
